name: Dreamobjects
tagline: ready to use implementation of direct upload to dreamobjects
body:
### Are you looking for an S3 alternative ?

Dreamobjects will be one of the best choice out there, but the only inconvenience I found is that there not much code to help implementing this solution very quickly, so in this post I will cover all the step you need to start uploading your files to dreamobjects easily without pain!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
